data.title: I Am Curious Blue by Sjoman Vilgot
data.meta_description: I Am Curious (Blue) / I Am Curious (Yellow). 2 vols. (complete set). by Sj√∂man, Vilgot and a great selection of related books, art and collectibles available now at AbeBooks.com.
data.text:
Paperbacks. Some minor traces of use, spines a bit creased, still a good set. Please see description or ask for photos.

Soft cover. Condition: Good. 1st Edition. 12mo, card covers, 219pp., b/w ills. First printing. Good: a very sound binding and a quite clean interior, but "good" inasmuch as covers rubbed with small scuffing to the foot of the front.

8vo. pp 219. Copiously illustrated in black and white throughout. Pages edges and covers slightly tanned, small ink ownership signature at half title, covers a little rubbed, tail of spine nicked, else clean and square. Very good.

Mass Market Paperback. Condition: Very Good. First Thus. Very Sharp copy with some spine wear/creases, and some creases at edges. Ow a very pretty book with "The complete scenario with over 270 illustrations" Book is a film script. Grove Press #B-238.

Hardcover. Condition: Good. First Edition. Good hardcover in very good dust jacket. Stated First Printing. Bind is tight and sturdy, but shaken from spine. Text, illustrations in excellent condition. Shelfwear is very minor. Ships from Dinkytown in Minneapolis, Minnesota.

Paperback. Condition: VERY GOOD-. Tight, bright, light age soil to exteriors, faint tilt. Rubbed covers and edges, creased spines, some creasing (blue). Owner's name stamped on title pages. Complete scenarios of the films with over 250 illustrations (photos from films) in each. Text in English. Erotica. Appropriate for adults.

Paperback. Condition: G+. No Jacket. 219 pp, b/w photos from movie, translated from the Swedish by Martin Minow and Jenny Bohman, this paperback book has minor wear on spine and a crease on lower right hand corner.

Hardcover. Condition: Very Good. Dust Jacket Condition: Good. First edition. Very good in good dustwrapper. Price clipped from dustwrapper, worn along edges. Please Note: This book has been transferred to Between the Covers from another database and might not be described to our usual standards. Please inquire for more detailed condition information.
